description.value:
Relic Mastercrafted Standard of the Deathwatch. Whils the Standard is held aloft, all Battle Brothers that can draw a line of sight to it can enter Squad Mode as a Free Action without a Test, and gain +10 to all Willpower Tests.

Effect: Hero

Notes: 40 R
